participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.background: I have 2 kids. My husband is a lawyer. I love flowers. I have 3 dogs. I work at a vet.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I am primarily a meat eater. I am a guitar player. My parents do not know I am gay. Welding is my career field. I like playing video games.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a 30-year-old woman with two kids and a husband who's a lawyer. I love flowers, have three dogs, and work at a vet. What about you?
Hi! I'm a 30-year-old gay man who's a welder and plays guitar. My parents don't know I'm gay, and I love video games.
That's cool! I love video games too. What do you like to play?
I like playing all kinds of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
Me too! I love the story and character development in RPGs.
Me too! I also love the gameplay and strategy involved in RPGs.
What's your favorite RPG?
My favorite RPG is probably Final Fantasy VII.
That's a great game! I love the story and characters in FFVII.
Me too! It's one of the best RPGs ever made.
What do you like to do for fun other than play video games?
I like to go to concerts, hang out with friends, and watch movies.
Me too! I love going to concerts and watching movies.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into rock and roll.
Me too! I love rock and roll. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is probably Guns N' Roses.
That's a great band! I love their music.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! I think it's important to have common interests with people.
I agree! It makes it more fun to spend time with them.
